title: Build social communication app with text chat and video calling

requirements.text: Create a user authentication system using Internet Identity to allow users to register and log in securely

quotes: Mujhe ek aap chahiye jisme me aur mare friends baat kar sake aur video call kar sake

acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
Authenticated users have a unique identity that persists across sessions
The app displays the current user's authentication status

requirements.text: Implement a friends list management system where users can add friends, view their friends list, and see online/offline status

quotes: Mujhe ek aap chahiye jisme me aur mare friends baat kar sake

acceptanceCriteria: Users can send friend requests to other users by their principal ID or username
Users can accept or decline friend requests
The friends list displays all accepted friends
Friends' online/offline status is visible in the list

requirements.text: Build a real-time text chat interface where users can send and receive text messages with their friends

quotes: me aur mare friends baat kar sake

acceptanceCriteria: Users can select a friend from their friends list to open a chat window
Users can type and send text messages to the selected friend
Messages appear in chronological order in the chat window
New messages are displayed in real-time or with polling
Chat history is preserved and can be scrolled through

requirements.text: Store chat messages in the backend with sender, recipient, timestamp, and message content, and provide query methods to retrieve chat history between two users

quotes: me aur mare friends baat kar sake

acceptanceCriteria: Messages are persisted in the Motoko backend
Users can retrieve their complete chat history with any friend
Messages include timestamp, sender ID, recipient ID, and text content
Only participants in a conversation can access their messages

requirements.text: Create a video calling interface with start call, end call, mute/unmute, and camera on/off controls for peer-to-peer video calls between friends
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate a video call with a friend from the chat interface
The recipient receives a call notification and can accept or decline
During a call, both users see each other's video feed
Users can mute/unmute their microphone during a call
Users can turn their camera on/off during a call
Users can end the call at any time
The video call interface is intuitive and responsive

requirements.text: Implement call signaling in the backend to manage video call sessions, including call invitations, acceptance, rejection, and session state tracking between users
acceptanceCriteria: Backend tracks active call sessions between users
Call invitations are stored and can be queried by the recipient
Call state (pending, active, ended) is maintained and accessible
Users cannot initiate multiple simultaneous calls
Call session data is cleaned up after calls end

requirements.text: Design a modern, vibrant UI with a warm and friendly color scheme (using coral, mint green, and soft yellow accents) that emphasizes connection and communication, with rounded corners, subtle shadows, and playful typography to create an inviting social experience
acceptanceCriteria: The app uses a cohesive color palette centered on warm, friendly colors
UI elements have consistent rounded corners and depth
Typography is clear and approachable
The overall design feels modern and social-focused
Interactive elements provide clear visual feedback

constraints: Real-time WebSocket communication is not supported; use polling or query-based approaches for message updates
Video calling must use WebRTC peer-to-peer connections; the backend only handles signaling
All user authentication must use Internet Identity only
No third-party communication APIs (Twilio, etc.) are available
nonGoals: Group video calls with more than two participants
File or image sharing in chat
Integration with external social media platforms
